Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Device control features provides general information and control for the device (camera) and its sensor. This is mainly used to identify the device during the enumeration process and to obtain information about the sensor resolution. Other information and controls pertaining to the general state of the device are also included in this category.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items that control the size of the acquired image and the format of the transferred pixel data

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items used to set the image acquisition parameters and to start and stop acquisition

Category.Name: StrobeControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items used to set the parameters for the integrated strobe controller

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items that control the analog characteristics of the video signal

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: The transport layer category includes items related to the GigE Vision transport layer

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.ToolTip: User Sets provides the features used to save camera settings to on-board non-volatile memory.

Enumeration.Name: EventSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Event to signal to the host application.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTemperatureSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.

EnumEntry.Name: Mainboard
EnumEntry.ToolTip: This enumeration value selects the temperature measured on the mainboard.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the temperature measured on the mainboard.

Float.Name: DeviceTemperature
Float.ToolTip: Device temperature in degrees Celsius (C). It is measured at the location selected by DeviceTemperatureSelector.
Float.Description: Device temperature in degrees Celsius (C). It is measured at the location selected by DeviceTemperatureSelector.

Category.Name: LensControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items used to set the parameters for the MFT Lens Control

Integer.Name: MFT_FOCALLENGTH
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the focal length
Integer.Description: This integer value sets the focal length.

Integer.Name: MFT_FOCUS
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the focus
Integer.Description: This integer value sets the focus.

Integer.Name: MFT_APERTURE
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the aperture
Integer.Description: This integer value sets the aperture.

Category.Name: DefectPixelCorrection
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items used to set the parameters for the Defect Pixel Correction

Enumeration.Name: DefectPixelCorrectionEnable_Control
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists the controlling states available for the defect pixel correction
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration provides a list of the values available for controlling the defect pixel correction.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the defect pixel correction
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value disables the defect pixel correction.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the defect pixel correction
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value enables the defect pixel correction.

Enumeration.Name: DefectPixelCorrectionMark_Control
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists the test modes available for the defect pixel correction
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration provides a list of the values available for setting test modes for the defect pixel correction.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the marking of the defect pixels
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value disables the marking of the defect pixels.

EnumEntry.Name: Mark
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the marking of the defect pixels
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value enables the marking of the defect pixels.

Enumeration.Name: DefectPixelCorrection_MapSelect
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists the available maps for the defect pixel correction
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration provides a list of maps available for the defect pixel correction.

EnumEntry.Name: factory
EnumEntry.ToolTip: factory map, containing defect pixels from sensor data sheet
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the factory map, containing defect pixels from sensor data sheet.

EnumEntry.Name: SVS
EnumEntry.ToolTip: SVS map, containing defect pixels detected by SVS
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the SVS map, containing defect pixels detected by SVS.

EnumEntry.Name: custom
EnumEntry.ToolTip: custom map, handled by customer
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the custom map, handled by customer.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelCorrection_MapSize
Integer.ToolTip: Reads the current number of defect pixels of the selected map
Integer.Description: This integer value reads the current number of defect pixels of the selected map.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelCorrection_OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the X offset of the selected map
Integer.Description: This integer value sets the X offset of the selected map.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelCorrection_OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the Y offset of the selected map
Integer.Description: This integer value sets the Y offset of the selected map.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelCorrection_MapIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the defect pixel map element to access
Integer.Description: This value sets the defect pixel map element to access. This value is used to index into a defect pixel map.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelCorrection_X
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the indexed X coordinate of the selected map
Integer.Description: This integer value sets the indexed X coordinate of the selected map.

Integer.Name: DefectPixelCorrection_Y
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the indexed Y coordinate of the selected map
Integer.Description: This integer value sets the indexed Y coordinate of the selected map.

Command.Name: DefectPixelCorrection_Delete
Command.ToolTip: Deletes the indexed X/Y coordinates of the selected map
Command.Description: This command deletes the indexed X/Y coordinates of the selected map.

Category.Name: Shading
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items used to set the parameters for the Shading Correction

Enumeration.Name: Shading_Control
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists the controlling states available for the shading correction
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration provides a list of the values available for controlling the shading correction.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the shading correction
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value disables the shading correction.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the shading correction
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value enables the shading correction.

Enumeration.Name: Shading_Status
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists the current state of the shading correction
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration provides a list of the values available for the operating states of the shading correction.

EnumEntry.Name: Shading_Error
EnumEntry.ToolTip: An error occured during shading
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value shows shading error.

EnumEntry.Name: Shading_Ready
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Shading is ready
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value shows shading is ready.

EnumEntry.Name: Shading_Dark
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Shading is acquiring a dark image
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value shows shading is acquiring a dark image.

EnumEntry.Name: Shading_White
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Shading is acquiring a white image
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value shows shading is acquiring a white image.

EnumEntry.Name: Shading_Save
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Shading is saving reference data
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value shows shading is saving reference data.

EnumEntry.Name: Shading_Init
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Shading is initialized
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value shows shading is initialized.

Command.Name: Shading_Get_White_Image
Command.ToolTip: Get a white image out of focus
Command.Description: This command gets a white image for the shading correction.
Command.DisplayName: Get a white image out of focus

Command.Name: Shading_Save_RefData
Command.ToolTip: Save reference data from white image
Command.Description: This command saves reference data from white image for the shading correction.

Category.Name: DigitalIOControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items used to control the operation of the camera's digital I/O lines
Category.Description: This category includes items used to control the operation of the camera's digital I/O lines

Category.Name: EnhancedIO
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items used to control the integrated PWM Controller

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects which physical network interface to control.
Integer.Description: Selects which physical network interface to control.

Enumeration.Name: GevDeviceModeCharacterSet
Enumeration.ToolTip: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.
Enumeration.Description: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.

Integer.Name: GevMCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port to which the device must send messages. Setting this value to 0 closes the message channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the port to which the device must send messages. Setting this value to 0 closes the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.
Integer.Description: TControls the destination IP address for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCTT
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevMCRC
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.
Integer.Description: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.

Integer.Name: GevMCSP
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the stream channel to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the stream channel to control.

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the timestamp value for the device
Command.Description: This command resets the timestamp value for the device

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlLatch
Command.ToolTip: Latches the current timestamp value of the device
Command.Description: This command latches the current timestamp value of the device.

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlLatchReset
Command.Description: This command resets the timestamp control latch.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampValue
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the latched value of the timestamp. (The timestamp must first be latched using the Timestamp Control Latch command.)
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the latched value of the timestamp. (The timestamp must first be latched using the Timestamp Control Latch command.)

Integer.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequency
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of timestamp clock ticks in 1 second
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the number of timestamp clock ticks in 1 second.

Command.Name: NetworkSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Saves the current network interface settings
Command.Description: Saves the current network settings to persistent memory.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the image acquisition mode
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the image acquisition mode.

EnumEntry.Name: SingleFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode to single frame
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the camera's acquisition mode to single frame

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode to multi frame
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the camera's acquisition mode to multi frame.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode to continuous
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the camera's acquisition mode to continuous.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.Description: This command starts the acquisition of images. If the camera is set for single frame acquisition, it will start acquisition of one frame. If the camera is set for continuous frame acquisition, it will start continuous acquisition of frames.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.Description: If the camera is set for continuous image acquisition and acquisition has been started, this command stops the acquisition of images.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists the trigger types available for selection
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration lists the types of trigger that are available for selection. Once a trigger type has been selected, all the other trigger features will be applied to the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the acquisition start trigger
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the acquisition start trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the frame start trigger
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the frame start trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists the modes available for the selected trigger
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration provides a list of the values available for setting the trigger mode for the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the mode for the selected trigger to off
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the mode for the selected trigger to off.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the mode for the selected trigger to on
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the mode for the selected trigger to on.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists the available sources for the selected trigger
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration lists the available trigger sources for the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the software trigger as the source for the selected trigger
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the source for the selected trigger to software trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the source for the selected trigger to line 1
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the source for the selected trigger to line 1.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists the trigger activation types available for the selected trigger
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration lists the trigger activation types available for the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the selected trigger signal to be valid when it is going high
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the trigger to be valid when the trigger signal is going high.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the selected trigger signal to be valid when it is going low
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the trigger to be valid when the trigger signal is going low.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates a software trigger signal that is used when the trigger source is set to 'software'
Command.Description: This command generates a software trigger signal. The software trigger signal will be used if the trigger source is set to 'software'.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Sets the camera's trigger delay in microseconds
Float.Description: Trigger Delay specifies the absolute delay in microseconds (us) to apply the trigger reception before effectively activating it.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists the available exposure modes
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration lists the available exposure modes.

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the exposure mode to timed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the exposure mode to timed.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerWidth
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the exposure mode to trigger width
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the exposure mode to trigger width.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Sets the camera's acquisition framerate in Hz
Float.Description: This float value sets the camera's acquisition framerate in Hz.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the number of frames acquired in the multiframe acquisition mode
Integer.Description: This value sets the number of frames acquired in the multiframe acquisition mode

Enumeration.Name: PixelColorFilter
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates the alignment of the camera's Bayer filter to the pixels in the acquired images
Enumeration.Description: This is a read only feature. This enumeration provides a list of values that indicate the alignment of the camera's Bayer filter to the pixels in the acquired images.

Enumeration.Name: BinningHorizontal
Enumeration.ToolTip: set the horizontal binning
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration controls the horizontal binning setting

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: horizontal binning disable

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: horizontal binning enable

Enumeration.Name: BinningVertical
Enumeration.ToolTip: set the vertical binning
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration controls the horizontal binning setting

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Vertical binning disable

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Vertical binning enable

Enumeration.Name: PixelSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: Available pixelsize settings

StringReg.Name: DeviceID
StringReg.ToolTip: A unique identifier such as a serial number or a GUID
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that provides a unique identifier such as a serial number or a GUID.

StringReg.Name: DeviceUserID
StringReg.ToolTip: A device ID that is user programmable
StringReg.Description: It is a user programmable string.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the width of the area of interest in pixels
Integer.Description: This value sets the width of the area of interest in pixels.

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the height of the area of interest in pixels
Integer.Description: This value sets the height of the area of interest in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the width of the camera's sensor in pixels
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It is an integer that indicates the actual width of the camera's sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the width of the camera's sensor in pixels
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It is an integer that indicates the actual width of the camera's sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the maximum allowed width of the image in pixels
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It is an integer that indicates maximum allowed width of the image in pixels taking into account any function that may limit the allowed width.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the maximum allowed height of the image in pixels
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It is an integer that indicates maximum allowed height of the image in pixels taking into account any function that may limit the allowed height.

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the left offset of the area of interest in pixels
Integer.Description: This value sets the left offset for the area of interest in pixels, i.e., the distance in pixels between the left side of the sensor and the left side of the image.

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the top offset for the area of interest in pixels
Integer.Description: This value sets the top offset for the area of interest, i.e., the distance in pixels between the top of the sensor and the top of the image,

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates the current pixelformat

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets the camera's exposure time in microseconds
Float.Description: This float value sets the camera's exposure time in microseconds.

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the gain control to configure. Once a gain control has been selected, all changes to the gain settings will be applied to the selected control.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the gain control to configure. Once a gain control has been selected, all changes to the gain settings will be applied to the selected control.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects all gain controls for adjustment
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects all available gain controls for adjustment.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: Sets the value of the selected gain in dB
Float.Description: Sets the dB value of the selected gain control.

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selcts a black level control to configure. Once a black level control has been selected, all changes to the black level settings will be applied to the selected control.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the black level control to configure. Once a black level control has been selected, all changes to the black level settings will be applied to the selected control.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects all black level controls for adjustment
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects all available black level controls for adjustment.

Integer.Name: BlackLevelRaw
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the value of the selected black level control as an integer
Integer.Description: This value sets the selected black level control as an integer.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceRatioSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects a balance ratio to configure. Once a balance ratio control has been selected, all changes to the balance ratio settings will be applied to the selected control.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects a balance ratio control to configuration. Once a balance ratio control has been selected, all changes to the balance ratio settings will be applied to the selected control.

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the red balance ratio control for adjustment
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the red balance ratio control for adjustment.

EnumEntry.Name: Green
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the green balance ratio control for adjustment
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the green balance ratio control for adjustment.

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the blue balance ratio control for adjustment
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the blue balance ratio control for adjustment.

Integer.Name: BalanceRatioRaw
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the value of the selected balance ratio control as an integer
Integer.Description: This value sets the selected balance ratio control as an integer.

Float.Name: BalanceRatio
Float.ToolTip: Controls ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component. It is used for white balancing.
Float.Description: Controls ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component. It is used for white balancing.

Float.Name: BalanceRatioAbs
Float.ToolTip: Controls ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component. It is used for white balancing.
Float.Description: Controls ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component. It is used for white balancing.

Enumeration.Name: StrobePolarity
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the camera's strobe polarity
Enumeration.Description: This Enumeration sets the camera's strobe polarity.

Float.Name: StrobeDuration
Float.ToolTip: Sets the camera's strobe duration in microseconds
Float.Description: This float value sets the camera's strobe duration in microseconds.

Float.Name: StrobeDelay
Float.ToolTip: Sets the camera's strobe delay in microseconds
Float.Description: This float value sets the camera's strobe delay in microseconds.
